mapper.select: SELECT r.*, f.facilities_name, c.company_name FROM repair r, facilities f, company c WHERE r.fac_code=f.fac_code AND r.company_code=c.company_code order by repair_code
select REPAIR_CODE, FAC_CODE, REPAIR_DATE, REPAIR_COMMENT, COMPANY_CODE, COST, ETC from repair where REPAIR_CODE = #{repairCode}
select max(repair_code) + 1 as repair_code from repair

select r.repair_code, f.facilities_name, r.repair_date, r.repair_comment, c.company_name, r.cost, r.etc from facilities f, repair r, company c where f.fac_code=r.fac_code and r.company_code=c.company_code order by r.repair_code
mapper.insert:
MERGE INTO repair r USING dual ON (r.repair_code = #{repairCode}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET r.FAC_CODE=#{facCode}, r.REPAIR_DATE=#{repairDate}, r.REPAIR_COMMENT=#{repairComment}, r.COMPANY_CODE=#{companyCode}, r.COST=#{cost}, r.ETC=#{etc}
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (r.REPAIR_CODE, r.FAC_CODE, r.REPAIR_DATE, r.REPAIR_COMMENT, r.COMPANY_CODE, r.COST, r.ETC) VALUES (repair_seq.nextval, #{facCode}, #{repairDate}, #{repairComment}, #{companyCode}, #{cost}, #{etc})
